content: in general a great app, however it is very annoying when some BRAINTOSSES aren't being sent and stuck in the queue - please fix this!
Great app! It helps me to empty my brain from the little tasks that keep buzzing in my head.
A great GTD app. Allows me to capture information and get it jnto my apps of choice very quickly.

I love this app. It is so easy to use and now I never forget anything. If I have a thought I need to remember later I quickly speak it or type it into the app and its in my email inbox to get to when I have time.
Wonderful App. Simplicity combined with functionality to the top. Makes sure you can empty your head from thoughts that keep coming back or can be forgotten. One of my favourites!

This is honestly one of the most valuable apps I have. When it comes to capturing your ideas, speed is critical, and Braintoss delivers. In just seconds and with no more than 2 clicks, I can capture text or voice notes and send them to my inbox to process later. Simple and effective.
This app makes it super easy to capture and send info to my email. I love it!

Fant√°stica aplicaci√≥n para capturar lo que te interrumpa en cualquier momento. Tanto para usuarios de GTD como para gente que simplemente requiere de una herramienta para capturar r√°pidamente. Permite enviar las capturas a diferentes cuentas de correo, es algo que normalmente se ve a primera vista pero que es muy √∫til si capturas algo para el trabajo, email del trabajo, o personal, email personal. Tuve unos d√≠as un problema con los env√≠os, que no sal√≠an y no s√© muy bien por qu√©, porque siempre uso la cuenta profesional, pero luego ya no volvi√≥ a fallar. Tienes la opci√≥n de reintentar si en el historial ves que no se ha enviado. Muy recomendable.
Very handy app, fast and simple.
So easy to use. Any time I'm on the run and have an idea or something I need to remember, I just click it.
Very quick way to capture a task. Much faster than emailing myself.
Just incredibly straightforward app which has incredible usability and does what it sets out to achieve fast. Kudos.

Wonderful app, that I've been using for years. I can be much more relaxed, not having to remember everything that pops up in my mind. I 'pop' it in Braintoss! Efficient! I am able to take care of many more things, without stress. And they have great support. Which I rarely have to make use of.
Great app
A phenomenal idea catcher. A must have app. Useful to one and all

Good app, but lately it keeps notes (especially pictures) listed as queued. In the latest version they do get sent but the 'queued' icon remains. This is not good for my OCD as I do not have confirmation that vital info has reached my mailbox.

Capture your idea GTD-style without any friction and process it the next time your check your email. Or use your unique omnifocus or trello email address, if that's your GTD tool. The design is sleek and works perfectly. There are more settings than the ones shown on the menu (write "settings", send yourself the note and instructions will be emailed back. I use it 30-40 times a day. Update: The development team fixed a issue I had by releasing a new version in a few hours. Two thumbs up!
Working great for me. Amazed that it is a one time purchase only and not subscription . It is saving me a lot of time and mind space
Probably a good app once I figure out how to use it. If the devs were going to go to the trouble of creating a faq and getting started guide, you would think they would tell you how to get started.

This was a great app. Just like the Boeing 737 was a great plane. Then came the 737 Max..... Be warned Andriod users. This app has more fuctionality, but is unrealiable. The one thing an app like this needs to be.
replyContent: Hi, the last months we made all kind of improvements on the performance of the app. Please download the latest version 6.8.179. This one is reliable and fast. If you still face any issues, please contact our customer service at info@braintoss.com

content: If I could give it a zero I would. It only works about 20% of the time. I sent myself a note last night. It never came through to my email. Sent another note to test it out and guess what? The note from last night came through but not the new Note. My email is Gmail and I've checked all the folders including spam. It isn't an organization problem with Gmail, this app just isn't send out all notes. This is hardly a productivity solution if you can't trust the app.
replyContent: Hi, sorry for the late reply. The last months we made all kind of improvements on the performance of the app. Please download the latest version 6.8.179. This one is reliable and fast. If you still face any issues, please contact our customer service at info@braintoss.com

replyContent: Do you still experience this issue? Would you please be so kind to open a ticket with support (https://braintoss.freshdesk.com/support/home)? That way we can look into a solution for you. Thanks!

content: Great app, does exactly what it does. Nice and simple. Heard about it on the Howard Stern Show.

content: Amazing app! More productive since I've started using it

content: Howard Stern brought me here. You guys just got a great free endorsement on his interview with Seth Myers. Bravo!

content: Exactly what I've been looking for a long time. Open app. Make note of thought. Press send. Lands in email box for me to deal with accordingly. Dead simple UI. Perfect. Thanks.

content: Great app. Really useful.
replyContent: Thank you for this positive feedback!

content: Great GTD Application for "Capture". I especially love the voice capture and convert to text which is perfect for capturing on the run. It's running absolutely perfect on my Android Note 10. Love it, thank you!
replyContent: Thank you for this positive feedback!

content: Cannot convert voice message to text, wonder how this is more productive and that too for a premium price
replyContent: Hi Sat, this problem is solved in the latest version v6.5.151 so please update. and hope you will review us again.

content: This is an amazing app especially when you suddenly remember something and after a while think what was it again. For me it is always grocery list or new serie to watch. Very easy to use. Love the interface and just great idea to get all those thoughts in your mailbox.
replyContent: Thank you for this positive feedback!

content: This is my go-to app for getting things out of my head and into my Getting things done inbox. It is super simple, but does exactly what it has to do to make me more efficient and more relaxed at the same time. The latest update has fixed the low imagine quality and no-sending issues (and now you can spot if a note didn't send). Great customer service too - thumps up to Remco for fixing my reported bug in record time.
replyContent: Michael! thanks for your positive reaction!

content: It does not transcribe voice to text, it will only send a mp3 file with the recording. support says that they were working on it but that's been a couple weeks and it still isn't fixed. The image quality when taking a picture through the app is also terrible.
replyContent: Hi S, we have fixed the transcription. Could you please test it and if its working review your one star rate? the image quality was already fixed en should be fine now. thanks! Remco

content: Does exactly what it says does. And brilliantly.

Took over 30 hours for my 20 character written note to show up in my email. I expected to receive my braintoss in my email much quicker than that. I'm very disappointed with this purchase. If this is the best this can do, I'd like to have my money back.

content: Utter nonsense. Simply unusable. Notes don't arrive even remotely instantaneously. For me, notes aren't arriving until I send additional notes many hours/days later. replyContent: Hi Elliot, I am sorry that you are having problems with Braintoss. I would like to investigate with you what the problem is. Would you like to send an email to support@braintoss.com so that I have your email address. Regards, Remco

content: Used to be a brilliant app. Now, however, tosses can take days to arrive, or until the next toss is sent. Highly unreliable. I uninstalled the app.
replyContent: Hi LG Boex, I am sorry to hear this. would you like to make a ticket at braintoss.freshdesk.com/support/home? then I have your email address and would like to investigate what went wrong. thanks! Remco

content: Love the app, the only issue I have is that the app needs to stay open to send the email/note. Many times I have taken quick notes and shut down after it sends and recieve them only once I open app up again to send next note. If this could be fixed it would be 5 stars
replyContent: we are currently working on a whole new version of the app that solves this problem. Regards, Remco

content: Bad sound quality, speech to text doesn't work at all
replyContent: we are currently working on a whole new version of the app that solves this problem. Regards, Remco

content: Downloaded for the voice part only. It is garbled and barely recognizable.

content: Really disappointed with Braintoss. My hope was very high, but experience very low. Audio quality dreadful, and no text transcription. Result: completely useless. About a week after creating support ticket, no response, not even an automated one. I so wanted this app to work, but it just doesn't. üòü

Like others, want to love this app. The concept is fantastic. Great interface - simple and clean. Where it badly falls down is that voice recognition is simply terrible. First test cases failed very badly. Would query it using Google speech recognition tech as don't have same problem with Google home. Early days and will revisit this review if improves. Ps would be happy to pay more for this if it worked!
Excellent
Perfect capture tool!

I love this app - centralises all on my email inbox. Ideal for GTD. I would like to see an Android auto enabled option. While I'm driving I have all sorts of ideas I'd love to record and send to myself.

The audio function on this is horrendous!!! I've sent 4 messages and none of them picked up correctly. Not worth 1.99. The other functionality I. E. Email and camera you can get by just sending yourself an email. Waste of time and money.
replyContent: Hi Will, sorry for the inconvenience and please allow us to refund you. We are currently experiencing issues with the voice to text that we can only fix by releasing an update which we are working on. Thanks for your feedback.

content: Voice recording is terrible quality on note 8. Shame as it's a great idea. Fix that and it's 5 stars from me!
replyContent: Hi Sam, many thanks for your feedback. This is a known issue indeed and we are working on it. Again thanks for making the effort of providing feedback and we hope the next release will be satisfying. Cheers, Richard

content: Complete garbage. Dictation is all over the place, don't waste your money!
Impossible to change message type if voice has been set as default. Does not recognize Russian speech at all.
I am not really sure why this app needs my GPS to work. Location in my opinion, is sensitive information. There is no clear privacy policy to state how this information is used.
replyContent: Hi Astrid, good question. We have only added this feature for your convenience. After a little while people who use Braintoss a lot find that it sometimes helps if they also know where they were when they Braintossed their reminder. The location is not used for anything else and can be switched off on your device if desired.

content:
I really want to like this app, but the primary reason that I purchased it 
was for capturing voice notes. It fails to properly transcribe voice inputs 
nearly 100% of the time. In this regard the app is useless.
replyContent: Hi Lee! Would you be so kind to contact us via https://braintoss.freshdesk.com/support/solutions and open a ticket about this? We'll get right into it. Thnx!

content: Well it sure does record your voice and email it to you! But the voice to text is absolutely atrocious. So far it's gotten zero words right out of 13 messages total. Unfortunate.

This app would be immensely helped by using Google's own text to speech. Its pointless to try and convert it yourself unless you just want the information to use yourself. Please switch this to Google Voice Recognition.
replyContent:
Thanks for your review. Amongst others we use Google technology for speech to text. What issues are you noticing?

Kind regards, Richard

content: Pixels of pictures is lower than of regular pics by the same mobile.... Why?

I downloaded the app because it say that I can use it with some apps like Todoist in my case but I couldn't find the way to integrate it with the app and it support page in Braintoss or Todoist are not helpful in this case, I think it should be very clear for causal users
replyContent: Hi jo jo, by adding the Todoist email-to-task address in the braintoss app you can drop tasks directly into Todoist. For more information please see https://braintoss.freshdesk.com/support/solutions/articles/17000039594-using-braintoss-with-task-services-like-todoist-evernote-onenote-etc-

content: Why does it require gps. Id like to take notes and pictures without the use of GPS.
replyContent: Hi, GPS is used to include the location of the reminder in the email. It can be turned off in the email settings (see support page) if desired

content: Doesn't recognise most words. Useless purchase
If you need to capture an idea quickly, nothing beats this great app!  Can't be simpler :)
It would be great if the subject of the email could be customized.
replyContent: Hi, this is possible. Send a Braintoss text note with the word settings in it and check the instructions in the email (or see our support page)

content: Dark Theme please
Camera image is upside down on android 7.1.1. No fix available from developer.
replyContent: Yes unfortunately on some Nexus devices we have not been able to address this as a quick fix. We will work on it though for a future release. Our apologies

content: Really easy way to stay on top of everything, any time, anywhere. The transcribing of voice is always wrong but highly entertaining.
This is a great app but a tablet version or compatiblity (landscape mode would be nice a tablet !). When sending audio files it be nice be able to title the voice message.
Good to use.
One suggestion please include send later option.
Simple and effective--especially when integrated with Evernote and GTD!!
Is compilers unusable. Back to Keep.

Although I've used the Evernote widget as my main capture tool, I also on occasion send myself emails with reminders to forward, etc.  Braintoss does it all!  You can simply enter your Evernote email address as the default, and your regular email as a second email.  Long press on the send button and you can pick your in box!  Configuration options are also available including eliminating attachments, plain text vs html.  Truly excellent implementation. Congrats!

I LOVE Braintoss!! I have been able to use it in so many ways. I will copy and paste website links I wish to save with a text braintoss. I will photograph a page of information instead of writing it all down, and send it to my email with braintoss. I use the voice messages all the time, to save important information and to brainstorm and document  spur of the moment ideas. It works flawlessly. The UI is easy to understand and the tutorial is great.
